mbean.description: Writes the bootstrap URL of the NamingService to a known location

attribute.description: URL of the base dir into which the file with the provider URL should be written
attribute.name: OutputDirURI

attribute.description: Name, relative to the OutputDirURL, of the file into which the provider URL should be written
attribute.name: OutputFileName

attribute.description: Server object from which the OutputDirURL can be obtained if not directly configured
attribute.name: Server

attribute.description: URL that can be accessed to bootstrap a connection to the NamingService
attribute.name: BootstrapURL

attribute.description: Address to use to create the BootstrapURL if it isn't directly configured
attribute.name: BootstrapAddress

attribute.description: Port to use to create the BootstrapURL if it isn't directly configured
attribute.name: BootstrapPort
